Text:
Thank you very much 

so great quality !
great video but what the fuck is with the subtitles! i can not get them off. this is bullshit

If there are subtitles, then you need to download mkvtoolnik. Within the folder you will find a file called mmg. When opened you will see it's called mkvmerge. Load the mkv video file into it, & untick the box that has the subtitles, then choose destination folder. After all that, press the button down the bottom called (start muxing) . File should be without subtitles once complete.
